BeritaAcara.title: BeritaAcara
BeritaAcara.description: Represents a news or event record for HMJMI Polsri.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BeritaAcara entity.

title.description: The title of the news or event.

content.description: The main content or description of the news or event, supports HTML.

date.description: The date and time when the news or event occurred or was published.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the news or event.

author.description: The author or source of the news or event, e.g., 'Dept. Humas'.

category.description: The category of the news item.

Division.title: Division
Division.description: Represents a division within HMJMI Polsri.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Division entity.

description.description: A brief description of the division's responsibilities and activities.

collections.description: Stores details about each division within HMJMI Polsri.
Stores news and event records for HMJMI Polsri. Includes `divisionId` to associate the event with a specific division.
